name: The Magical Caster Card Gun
description:
One day you wake up in a magical world. 

Armed with only a gun and some playing cards, what could be happening? 

Then you realize the gun becomes powered by the cards!

Quick draws, smooth shuffling and an itchy trigger finger will get you far in this fast actioned world. 

Made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 41

It's pretty rushed but let me know what you think! 

WASD moves

Right click shoots

Left click discards

Shift Shuffles

'R' resets level

'esc' gets you back into the menu

Didn't have time to make saving (and a lot of other things...) so best enjoyed in one sitting. But then come back to beat you times ;)
